content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the boiler and steam engine at positions (-5.5, 16.5) and (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity Group at position (-5.4, 20.0) which is not plugged into the electric network

### Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Related to Fuel and Ingredients
- Ensure that all necessary ingredients are available for the stone furnace to function.
- Make sure to keep the boiler fueled to maintain the operation of the steam engine.

### Errors in Electric Network Connection
- Ensure that the electricity group is properly connected to the electric network to allow power distribution.
- Verify that small electric poles are correctly placed to connect the electricity group.

### IndexError in Code Execution
- Check the list indices when accessing elements to prevent out-of-range errors.

### Errors When Inserting Items
- Verify that the inventory contains the items you are trying to insert into entities.
- Ensure that there is coal available in the inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler.
